index.header: Apply for a refugee integration loan
index.text1: If you are a refugee or have been given humanitarian protection, you can apply for a loan to help you settle into UK society.
index.text2: To apply, you will need your:
index.text3: If you are applying together with a partner, you will also need their BRP details.
index.getHelpText1-2: can help you with your application and filling in the form.
index.getHelpText2: You can also contact the integration loan team at integrationloan@homeoffice.gov.uk

previously-applied.header: Have you or anyone currently living at your address applied for an integration loan before?

partner.header: Do you have a partner with you in the UK?
partner.intro: A partner is someone over the age of 18 who you’re married to or in a civil partnership with, or live with as if you are.

joint.header: Are you applying for a loan together with your partner?

brp.header: What are your biometric residence permit (BRP) details?
brp.intro: Enter your details as they appear on your BRP.

ni-number.header: What is your National Insurance number?

has-other-names.header: Have you been known by any other names?

home-office-reference.header: What is your Home Office reference number?

partner-brp.header: What are your partner’s biometric residence permit (BRP) details?
partner-brp.intro: Enter details as they appear on your partner’s BRP.

partner-ni-number.header: What is your partner’s National Insurance number?

partner-has-other-names.header: Has your partner been known by any other names?

convictions.header: Have you ever been convicted of a crime in the UK?
convictions.intro: Some crimes could affect your application, but we won’t use this information for anything else.

convictions-joint.header: Have you or your partner ever been convicted of a crime in the UK?
convictions-joint.intro: Some crimes could affect your application, but we won’t use this information for anything else.

dependents.header: Do you have any dependants living with you?
dependents.intro: A dependant could be a child under 18, grandchild, parent, or someone who depends on you for care.

intro.default: You can add more dependants later.

humanitarian-refugee-status-date.header: What date were you granted refugee or humanitarian protection status?

address.header: What is your address in the UK?
address.intro: If you have no fixed address, enter an address where we can contact you.

combined-income.header: You and your partner’s combined monthly income

combined-outgoings.header: You and your partner’s combined monthly outgoings

combined-amount.header: What loan amount would you like to apply for?

purpose.header: What will you use the loan for?

bank-details.header: What are your bank or building society account details?
bank-details.intro: We will send your loan to this account.

contact.header: How would you like us to contact you?

outcome.postTo: We will post your decision letter to

help.header: Did you get any help making this application?

who-helped.header: What are the details of the person who helped you?

confirm.header: Check your answers before sending your application
confirm.text1: By submitting this application, you agree that:
confirm.bullet1: the information is correct and complete as far as you know
confirm.bullet2: you will use the loan for its intended purpose
confirm.bullet3: you have read and understood the

confirmation.text1: We’ll contact you with the outcome of your application or if we need more information from you.
confirmation.text2: If you have been successful, we will send you a loan agreement by email or post. You will need to go online to accept the terms of this agreement.
confirmation.text3: If you have been unsuccessful, we will write to you explaining the reasons for this decision.

ineligible.header: You cannot apply for a loan
ineligible.text1: As you or your partner have already received an integration loan, you cannot apply again.
ineligible.text2: Your local refugee community organisation may be able to tell you what other support is available.
